DESIGN NARRATIVE : Forty subject ( 20 male , 20 female ) age 50 older , LDL cholesterol concentration great 130 mg/dl feed five diet eight week period . The baseline diet consist 36 percent energy fat ( 15 percent saturate , 15 percent monosaturated , 6 percent polyunsaturated ) 160 mg cholesterol/1000 kcal . The experimental diet contain 30 percent energy fat , 2/3 derive following : 1 ) unhydrogenated liquid soybean oil , 2 ) soybean oil margarine tub form , 3 ) commercial shortening , 4 ) butter randomize double blind , cross-over design .
